text: This was the first edition of the tournament.https://www.atptour.com/en/tournaments/baotou/8270/overview James Duckworth won the title after defeating Sasikumar Mukund 6–4, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw International Challenger Baotou - Singles
